Class ConsolePasswordUI

java.lang.Object
main.utils.Password.ConsolePasswordUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
PasswordUI
public class ConsolePasswordUI extends Object implements PasswordUI
Console-based implementation of the PasswordUI interface.

This class provides user interaction for password-related operations via the console, including reading the current, new, and confirmation passwords, and displaying messages or errors.
